title: I want to change the order of the navigation buttons on my pixel 5 i.e. Back button on the left
content: I just got my pixel 5 and not used to the swipe back option. Interferes with cropping photos. I want to configure my 3 button navigation to have back button on the right instead of left but can't find the option to do so as compared to previous android phones
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
